author: CBS News
title: Randy Newman has a message: "Stay Away"
description: The Oscar-winning singer-songwriter's new coronavirus-themed composition is a love song of sorts, perfect for a time of isolation
content:
When the road looks rough aheadAnd you're miles and miles from your nice warm bedYou just remember what your old pal saidBoy, you've got a friend in me
Randy Newman has plenty of friends, but of course he can't get together with any of them these days. The O… [+3892 chars]
